RTL960x.summary: Recent activity in RTL960x involved the submission of a new pull request, proposing the addition of Mikrotik hAP ax3 on 2025-02-07.

RTL960x (bayasdev).summary: Bayasdev made significant changes in RTL960x, specifically adding Mikrotik hAP ax3 on 2025-02-07, through a push event.

console (bayasdev).summary: Console experienced an update on 2025-02-06 with key modifications, including but not limited to: optional debug logging for console requests, express version bump, actions/download-artifact version, webpack version bump and several v1.7.x releases.

profile_summary: As a seasoned software engineer with a proven track record in delivering high-quality solutions, I specialize in building scalable applications with languages like TypeScript, Python, and JavaScript. With over 32 public repositories and a steadily growing network of 73 followers, I demonstrate my commitment to open-source development and community engagement. Currently working at MinIO, I leverage my expertise to drive innovation in cloud storage and infrastructure solutions.
